snippet.title: Infested Planet March 6th Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Infested Planet is a strategy game, available on Early Access now!  Full release on March 6th: http://store.steampowered.com/app/204530

This is the release trailer showing off the game for its March 6th release.

Video: Marlon Wiebe
Audio: Kevin Regamey
Voice: Adam Harrington
